mapper.select: select user_id as userId, user_nm as userNm, admin_yn as adminYn, dept_id as deptId, emp_no as empNo, phone, email, rank_cd as rankCd, fn_code_nm('empRank', rank_cd) as rankCdNm, emp_status as empStatus, fn_code_nm('empStatus', emp_status) as empStatusNm, concat('/static/img/', file_nm) as photo, fn_dept_nm(dept_id) as deptNm, u.crt_dtm as crtDtm from tb_user u left join tb_profile using(user_id) where dept_id = #{deptId} order by crtDtm, rankCd

select user_id as userId, password, user_nm as userNm, admin_yn as adminYn, dept_id as deptId, emp_no as empNo, phone, email, rank_cd as rankCd, fn_code_nm('empRank', rank_cd) as rankCdNm, emp_status as empStatus, fn_code_nm('empStatus', emp_status) as empStatusNm, concat('/static/img/', file_nm) as photo, u.crt_dtm as crtDtm from tb_user u left join tb_profile using(user_id) where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_user( user_id, password, user_nm, admin_yn, dept_id, emp_no, email, phone, rank_cd, emp_status )values ( #{userId}, #{password}, #{userNm}, #{adminYn}, #{deptId}, #{empNo}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{rankCd}, (SELECT MIN(code_id)FROM tb_code_master cm LEFT JOIN tb_code USING(code_master_id) WHERE code_master_nm = 'empStatus') )
mapper.update: update tb_user set user_nm = #{userNm}, emp_no = #{empNo}, email = #{email}, phone = #{phone}, rank_cd = #{rankCd}, emp_status = #{empStatus} where user_id = #{userId}
